inputs.selection_motivation: ECB policy directly sets monetary conditions that determine the euro's value, making it a primary driver of the EUR node.
inputs.candidate_motivation: ECB Policy directly shapes euro-area monetary conditions and inflation dynamics, creating strong links to related macro assets and markets. The strongest plausible influences/correlates/peers include euro-area inflation, the euro, EURUSD, US Fed Policy and US Dollar, plus major eurozone and global equity and commodity indicators that react to rate expectations (S&P 500, Eurostoxx 50, Oil, Gold).

proposed_link.motivation: ECB policy directly sets monetary conditions that determine the euro's value, making it a primary driver of the EUR node.
